title: Let's go riding
creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
brief_description: The progress story of a father and daughter whose visit to a riding school decides them to take up riding. As a result of further training at a pony club and a riding club they reach a sufficient standard to consider specialising in dressage, show jumping and cross country. The film also contains examples of top grade riding at national and international events.
